_comment: Core Space First Born - Character Builder Data

characters.name: Cassie
characters.description: Former marine sniper and expert marksman
characters.notes: Cassie starts with 4 inherent skill points (Evade 1 + Weapons Expert 2 + Slippery 1). She has 4 spendable points + up to 3 level-up bonuses (max 7 total spendable).

characters.name: Wade
characters.description: Ex-mercenary and skilled tinkerer who's in it for the money. Good at improvising weapons but prefers to let others make the hard decisions. Fast and tactical.
characters.notes: Wade begins with Distraction 1 for free and tracks his trader-class skill points separately from inherent abilities.

characters.name: Hopper
characters.description: Reprogrammed host protocol machine serving as ship tactician. Expert in Machine systems, hacking, and negotiation. Excellent ego-free negotiator who knows everything about Machine systems.
characters.notes: Hopper keeps Barter 1 inherently and invests additional Machine skills via the Machine class card.

characters.name: Balcor
characters.description: Skilled Nerind'ar engineer with modified prosthetic arm. Considerably taller and stronger than humans, prefers unarmed combat. Timid by nature but fierce when the crew is in danger.
characters.notes: Balcor starts with Brutal Assault at level 2 and builds additional resilience and close combat tricks through Support or Marine class boards.

characters.name: Daric
characters.description: Human trader with exceptional mobility, resilience, and diplomatic skills.
characters.notes: Daric has +1 inch movement as an inherent ability (moves 1 additional inch during Move actions).

characters.name: Qiog
characters.description: Trader of unknown race with exceptional resilience and skill.
characters.notes: Qiog is of unknown race origin with high skill but lower health, compensated by Impervious ability.

characters.name: Yeti
characters.description: Small-sized trader with technical expertise and sensor manipulation abilities.
characters.notes: Yeti is small-sized (not Massive), which means they do not block LoS to Massive characters but may provide cover. Easier to move by other characters.

characters.name: Lohbac
characters.description: App'a warrior with enhanced close combat abilities and martial arts expertise.
characters.notes: Lohbac rolls 2 dice (total, not bonus) for Close Assault actions when unarmed. If using a weapon, use weapon's statistics instead. App'a racial trait.

characters.name: XL
characters.description: Large machine with heavy armor and devastating close combat capabilities. Restricted to Machine class only.
characters.notes: XL is Massive (can be seen over smaller characters, reduces Knock Back against them, adds automatic hits to own Knock Back, can move items/smaller characters at full speed). Has permanent armor value of 1 (use highest if wearing armor). Rolls 3 dice (total, not bonus) for Close Assault when unarmed (use weapon stats if armed). Machine class only.

classes.name: Marine
classes.description: Combat specialist with expertise in ranged and close combat

availableSkills.notes: Cassie has inherent level 2, can only invest 1 more point (max 3 total)

classes.name: Crewman
classes.description: Versatile crew member with social and stealth skills
classes.flavorText: Jack of all trades, adaptable in any situation

availableSkills.notes: Cassie has inherent level 1, can only invest 1 more point (max 2 total)
Cassie has inherent level 1, can only invest 1 more point (max 2 total)

classes.name: Hunter
classes.description: Stealth assassin with ranged and close combat prowess
classes.flavorText: Silent predator who strikes from the shadows

availableSkills.notes: Cassie has inherent level 2, can only invest 1 more point (max 3 total)
Cassie has inherent level 1, can invest 2 more points (max 3 total)

classes.name: Support
classes.description: Heavy combat specialist with endurance and leadership
classes.flavorText: Front-line fighter who bolsters the team

classes.name: Tech
classes.description: Technical specialist with gadgets and support abilities
classes.flavorText: Master of technology and tactical support

classes.name: Machine
classes.description: Robotic specialist with self-repair and combat protocols

levels.description: Make a Move action.
Make two extra Move and/or Assault actions this turn. You may make your other actions before, during or after these actions.

levels.trigger: When an enemy ends a move within 4 inches of you and you are in full or partial cover
levels.effect: Make a Ranged Assault action against that enemy. You may make a Proximity Move before or after this action.

levels.trigger: When an enemy ends a move within 4 inches of you and you are in full or partial cover
levels.effect: Make a Move action and then an Assault action against that enemy. You may make a Proximity Move before or after these actions.

levels.trigger: When an enemy ends a move within 4 inches of you and you are in full or partial cover
levels.effect: Make a Move action, an Assault action against any enemy, and then another Move action. You may make a Proximity Move before, during or after these actions.

levels.description: Target yourself or another member of your crew. They cannot be harmed by ranged attacks for the rest of the round.
Target yourself or another member of your crew. They restore 2 Health.
Co-ordinate your team with vital intelligence. Target yourself and two other members of your crew. Each character may make 1 action, resolved in any order.
Trade Phase: Perform one of the following: re-roll a Ship Repair cost result, re-roll a Raw Blue sale price result, or sell one item for its buy value (maximum 10UA).
You expel a focused percussive blast of energy from your limbs. Make a ranged attack with 3-2-0 statistics.
You expel the energy behind you to propel yourself up and forward. Make two Move actions, ignoring all intervening cover and characters.
You expel energy in all directions. All characters within short range suffer an attack with 3 dice and are pushed away a number of inches equal to hits scored, with no attacks of opportunity.
Use at any time. Make a Move action.
Target a friendly character in base contact. They restore 1 Health. While in contact, you may take any or all hits that they suffer on yourself instead until the end of the round.

Use at any time. Make two Move actions and a Close Assault action, in any order. After the Close Assault action, if the enemy has not been defeated, roll a combat die. If you score one or more hits, the enemy is knocked prone.
Make a Close Assault action using only your base ability with one extra combat die. If the target survives lay it prone.

Choose a character you are engaged with that is no bigger than you and throw them. Move them into any square within short range and line of sight. They suffer no attacks of opportunity from this move. They suffer a two-dice attack, rolling an additional die if a wall or other terrain piece prevented them being thrown the full distance. Then lay them prone.
Make up to three Close Assault actions using only your base ability. If the target survives lay it prone. Then make a Move action.

While you are in base contact with any wall you cannot be targeted for the rest of the round. Enemies cannot enter base contact with you. You do not block line of sight to other characters in any way.

Make a Ranged Assault action. While you are in base contact with any terrain you cannot be targeted for the rest of the round. Enemies cannot enter base contact with you. You do not block line of sight to other characters in any way.
Make a Move action ending in base contact with an enemy. Then make a Knock Back action. Hits on Knock Back are applied as additional damage to the enemy. Armour applies normally.
During Move actions this round, you can make free close assault attacks on up to 3 characters you contact during movement. Ignore attacks of opportunity from these characters.

levels.passiveEffect: Ignore one hit scored against you during any attack of opportunity.

levels.description: You sweep your enemy's feet from under them. A target enemy in base contact is knocked prone.

levels.passiveEffect: You may make a Close Assault action as an effortless action.

levels.description: Use when making a close assault attack to use a pistol or rifle instead of a close assault weapon. Roll to hit as normal using the weapon's short range statistic, and add 2 dice to the attack. This uses ammo as normal.

You burst out of combat. All enemies engaged with your character can be pushed up to 2 inches away in a direction of your choice, stopping if they hit a wall or other obstruction. No attacks of opportunity are made, but each enemy pushed back suffers an attack with 2 dice (armour applies as normal). Then, you may make a Move action.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a ranged attack
levels.effect: Make a ranged attack against the attacker.

levels.trigger: At any time after a target enemy has taken its first action in the current round
levels.effect: Make a ranged attack against the target.

levels.trigger: At any time
levels.effect: Make a ranged attack against an enemy with one extra combat die, and then make a Move action.

levels.trigger: After being attacked with a close assault action in which you took no damage
levels.effect: The weapon that the attacker used is removed from their dashboard and scattered.

levels.trigger: After being attacked with a close assault action in which you took no damage
levels.effect: The weapon that the attacker used is removed from their dashboard and added to yours. If you do not have space for it you may place it on top of your current items and use it until you are no longer engaged with that enemy, at which point it must be dropped or swapped with your items.

levels.trigger: After being attacked with a close assault action in which you took no damage
levels.effect: As level 2. In addition you can make an immediate Close Assault action with the stolen weapon, followed by a Move action with no attacks of opportunity allowed.

levels.description: Allow natural rage to flood the body. For this turn: move an additional 2 inches and roll 2 extra combat dice in Close Assault. At turn's end, become disconnected from handler.

Fill body with unbridled rage. For this turn: gain an extra action, move an additional 2 inches, roll 2 extra combat dice in Close Assault, and enemies contacted during moves are knocked prone. At turn's end, become disconnected from handler.
Use when making a Ranged Assault action. The target loses 1 action in its next turn in addition to any damage caused.
Make a Ranged Assault action. Any one enemy within short range of the target misses its entire next turn in addition to any damage caused. Then make a Move action.

Make a Ranged Assault action. You may then make a Move action with the target model (you cannot use this Move to enter base contact with an enemy), and it will miss its entire next turn in addition to any damage caused. Then make a Move action yourself.
Target an enemy Trader with Tech Class within medium range (they cannot use any Tech Skills this round) OR target up to 2 Purge (rank 1-3 only) within medium range (they miss their next turn).
All enemy Traders with Tech Class within medium range cannot use any Tech Skills this round OR all Purge (rank 1-3 only) within medium range miss their next turn.

Choose one: Target an enemy Trader with Tech Class within medium range (cannot use Tech Skills for rest of game) OR target an enemy Trader with Tech Class anywhere on board (cannot use Tech Skills this round) OR all Purge (rank 1-3 only) within medium range miss next two turns OR all Purge (rank 1-3 only) on board miss next turn.
Boost your vitality. Make a Move action or Ranged Assault action OR restore 1 Health.
Make a Repair action. Do not roll – apply up to two Repair Points automatically. Additional Repair Points may be applied by spending additional actions.

levels.trigger: When an enemy moves into base contact with you
levels.effect: Make a Move action, ignoring attacks of opportunity.

levels.trigger: When an enemy moves into base contact with you
levels.effect: In any order, make a Move action, ignoring attacks of opportunity, and an Assault action.

levels.trigger: When an enemy moves into base contact with you
levels.effect: In any order, make two Move actions, ignoring attacks of opportunity, and an Assault action. The attacker cannot do anything further this round, including using Skills.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a ranged attack if you are within 4 inches of cover
levels.effect: Move into cover.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a ranged attack if you are within 4 inches of cover
levels.effect: Move into cover, and ignore all hits scored in that attack.

levels.trigger: At any time
levels.effect: Make a Move action into cover, ignoring any attacks of opportunity, and make a Ranged Assault action, in any order. You cannot be targeted for the rest of the round.

levels.description: Make any two of the following actions, in any order, before, after or between your other actions this turn: Move; Unlock and open a door or Searchable terrain piece in short range; Lock and close a door or Searchable terrain piece in short range (may be the same one).

Move adjacent to another character and roll a die to attempt to pickpocket them as follows: • Critical fail: You fail. There is no effect. • Blank: One of the target's items, chosen at random, is scattered. • One hit: Take a small item of your choice from the target's item tray. • Two hits: Take any item of your choice from the target's item tray and knock them prone. Then make another Move action, with no attack of opportunity.

Use a homemade miniaturised portal device to inspect the contents of any Searchable terrain piece within medium range. Then roll a combat die: • Critical fail: Return all the items. • Blank: Take or swap a small item of your choice. • One hit: Take or swap any item of your choice. • Two hits: Take or swap all items, and distribute them between your own equipment tray and your ship's hold. You may then lock the terrain piece if you wish.
Shut down a Purge character (rank 1-2 only) within medium range. Remove the character from play. OR Lock/unlock a door in base contact.
Shut down up to 2 Purge characters (rank 1-2 only) within medium range. Remove them from play. OR Lock/unlock any door within medium range.

Shut down up to 2 Purge characters (rank 1-3 only) within medium range. Remove them from play. OR Take control of any Purge character (rank 1-3 only) within medium range. OR Lock or unlock any one door on the board.

Make a Move action towards your handler via the shortest possible route. If you enter base contact with your handler, any hits that your handler suffers from attacks this round are taken on you instead (armour applies as normal).

Make up to two Move actions towards your handler via the shortest possible route. If you enter base contact with your handler, any hits that your handler suffers from attacks this round are taken on you instead (armour applies as normal). Your handler also restores 1 Health.

Make up to three Move actions (up to the normal 11 inch limit) towards your handler via the shortest possible route. You may move through other characters, making a free Knock Back action on each one you pass through. If you enter base contact with your handler, any hits that your handler suffers from attacks this round are taken on you instead (armour applies as normal). Your handler also restores 1 Health.
While in cover, you cannot be damaged by ranged attacks until the end of the round, although you can be targeted as normal.
While in cover or at more than short range, you cannot be damaged by ranged attacks until the end of the round, although you can be targeted as normal.
Make a Ranged Assault action followed by a Move action. You cannot be damaged by any enemy ranged attacks until the end of the round, although you can be targeted as normal.

levels.trigger: When another rule or Skill causes you to lose any actions or miss your next turn
levels.effect: Ignore the effect.

levels.description: Consider your physical armour value to be 2 higher than it currently is until the end of the round.

Restore 1 Health. This may take you above your starting level as long as there is space on your dashboard, for this game only. In addition, you may not take any damage, be Knocked Back, or be affected by any rule that causes you to lose actions or miss your turn until the end of the round after the current one.
Use when making a close assault attack. Add 2 dice to the attack.
Use when making a close assault attack. Add 3 dice to the attack.
Use when making a close assault attack. Add 4 dice to the attack. After rolling the dice, you can split the hits scored between any number of enemies in base contact.

levels.trigger: After being attacked with a close assault action in which you took no damage
levels.effect: Take any item from the attacker's item tray other than the one they attacked with. If you do not have space for it, it or another item you are holding must be dropped.

levels.trigger: After being attacked in close assault
levels.effect: Take any item from the attacker's item tray other than the one they attacked with. Items with the [check] icon can be used immediately. Otherwise, if you do not have space for it, it or another item you are holding must be dropped.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a close assault attack
levels.effect: Take any item from the attacker's item tray. Items with the [check] icon can be used immediately. Otherwise, if you do not have space for it, it or another item you are holding must be dropped. Then make an immediate Move or Assault action, ignoring attacks of opportunity.

levels.description: Make a ranged attack.

Make a ranged attack with one extra combat die. After rolling the dice, you can split the hits scored between up to two eligible targets within range of your weapon and within short range of each other.

Make a ranged attack with two extra combat dice. After rolling the dice, you can split the hits scored between any number of eligible targets within range of your weapon and within short range of each other.
You disrupt the mind of the enemy. Target an enemy in LoS. They miss their next turn.
You disrupt the enemy's equipment. Target an item held by an enemy in LoS. That item immediately breaks.

You alter the environment around you. Perform one of the following: Move any small terrain item (such as a cargo crate or table) or loose item token in LoS up to short range from its current location. OR Hurl any small to medium terrain item (like a vending machine or table) in medium range and LoS up to short range from its current location. If it hits a character, it will stop and an attack roll of 4 dice is made against the target.

levels.passiveEffect: Re-roll one die on any Persuade roll.

levels.description: Extraction Phase: Use before rolling on the 'You're on Your Own' or Apprehended tables for yourself or any other crew member. Ignore any UA cost. Gain a Career Point after use.
Extraction Phase: Your crew can work with crews from enemy captains on diplomatic missions. Enemy crew will never attack you, and you may assist them with Persuade actions and similar Skills.

levels.trigger: After scoring one or more hits on an enemy in close assault
levels.effect: Make another Close Assault action.

levels.trigger: After scoring one or more hits on an enemy with any attack
levels.effect: Make a Move if you wish, and then make another Close Assault action.

levels.description: Use during a Move action. You may ignore attacks of opportunity during this Move, and you may make a close assault attack against each enemy you come into contact with while moving.
Take any action.
Take any two actions and then lose 1 Health.

Overload your power cells and self-destruct. Make a ranged attack against each character within short range with five combat dice. Make a ranged attack against each character in medium range with two combat dice. After resolving the attacks roll the Chance Die for consequences (see full rules).

Make a Persuade action against an enemy Trader (with their own default (not current) Skill statistic counting as their Persuade value) within short range and LoS, to try to dissuade them from their mission. If successful, they miss their next turn.

Make a Persuade action against a non-Purge enemy within short range and LoS, with 1 additional die. Targeted Traders use their Skill statistic as above. The normal options apply (although enemy Traders will not join you), and in addition you can Persuade a character to miss their next turn.

Make a Persuade action against a non-Purge enemy within short range and LoS, with 2 additional dice. Targeted Traders use their Skill statistic as above. The same options apply as above, except that Trader crew (not captains) can be persuaded to join you, for the rest of this mission only. They will never attack their old crew members. Like Civilians, you must roll the Chance Die each round before activating them. On a result they will return to their old crew.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a close assault attack
levels.effect: Ignore all hits scored.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a close assault attack
levels.effect: Ignore all hits scored. Then, make an immediate Close Assault action against the attacker, rolling 1 additional die.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with a close assault attack
levels.effect: Ignore all hits scored. Then, make an immediate Close Assault action against the attacker, rolling 2 additional dice, followed by a Move action with no attacks of opportunity allowed.

levels.description: Jam enemy sensors to remove a peg from the Hostility Tracker OR apply one Repair Point to any item or Machine in base contact.
Choose an Entry or Patrol Point and turn the counter over. Nothing will enter from this point until the next Hostility level is reached. If this Entry or Patrol Point is rolled, roll again.
Make a Repair or Clear Jam action on yourself or any other character or equipment in base contact, with one automatic hit added to the roll.
Apply three Repair Points to yourself or any item or machine in base contact.

Release a cloud of repair nanites. Fully Repair one object or heal any Machine character in short range (including yourself), without rolling. Any other objects, items or Machine characters in short range can apply 1 Repair Point.
Use after being defeated. You are no longer defeated – restore 2 Health and Stand Up.
Activate self-repair systems and restore 2 Health.
Use when in base contact with a wall that does not contain a door or window. Patch into the internal substructure to recharge. Restore your Health to its maximum.
Target a cargo crate within short range and LoS. Inspect the contents and then put it back inside.
You can intercept Purge sensors and relay false data. Target any 2 Purge characters (rank 1-3 only) within medium range and make a Move action with them in a direction of your choice.

You can send out a jamming pulse that blocks all transmissions and micro control data. Reduce or increase the Hostility Tracker by 2 points. All other Traders with the Machine Class and Purge of rank 1-3 miss their next turn.
Make a Move action with Scramble [2,3]
levels.notes: Scramble adds +2 to all scramble attempts

levels.passiveEffect: You may use an effortless action to ignore an attack of opportunity.

levels.description: Make a Move action. This and all of your other Move actions in this turn ignore attacks of opportunity. Make an attack with one die against each enemy contacted during your moves. Any hits will also knock them prone, even if no damage is caused.
You have a penchant for discovery. Re-roll any Chance die once per game.

Assessment Phase: Produce a chemical compound. Choose one: 1 medkit OR Tier 1 armour-reducing chemical weapon OR a corrosive chemical that unlocks any locked door or searchable terrain. Lasts one game.
Assessment Phase: You can mix and refine raw materials with precision. Choose one: 1 item of equipment up to 6UA (or 10UA if Scientist class) OR 1 equipment token OR 1 booster pack.
Emit a Merg call that intimidates and disorientates. Make a Move action OR target up to 3 rank 1-2 characters within medium range and reduce their hit points on next attack by 1.
Emit a low-frequency pulse. All Purge characters (rank 1-3 only) within short range miss next turn and are knocked prone.
Generate a powerful sonic pulse. All rank 1-3 Purge characters within medium range miss their next 2 turns and are knocked prone OR all rank 1-3 Purge characters on the board miss their next turn.
Make a Move action.
Make a Move action followed by an Assault action.
Target 1 enemy within short range and roll a die against them. Assign resulting hits.
Target 2 enemies within medium range and roll 1 die against each. Assign resulting hits.
Target any number of enemies within medium range and roll 1 die against each. Assign resulting hits.
Use after taking an action. Another Trader in your crew within short range and line of sight immediately makes the same action for free.
Advancement Phase: Add one Career Point to any other Trader in your crew (level 1-2 only).
Advancement Phase: Add one Career Point to any two Traders in your crew. One can be at any level; the other is level 1-2 only.
Restore 1 Health.

levels.trigger: After being targeted with an attack
levels.effect: Reduce damage sustained by 2.

levels.trigger: After being defeated
levels.effect: You are no longer defeated – restore 1 Health, Stand Up, and you may then make a Move action.

levels.passiveEffect: You may Reload as an effortless action.

levels.description: Make a ranged attack, rolling 2 additional dice. You cannot Move in the same round that you use this Skill.

levels.passiveEffect: You may make a Ranged Assault action with a pistol as an effortless action.

levels.description: Use when making a ranged attack. You may fire two different pistols as a single action – add their dice together and subtract one die.

You can shoot a weapon from an enemy's hand. Make a ranged attack. This rolls two dice regardless of the weapon's statistics but must be within range and LoS as normal. If at least one hit is scored, no damage is done, but a weapon of your choice is removed from their dashboard and scattered. The weapon is broken but can be Repaired as normal.
